/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, the iconic landmark, the Great Hall of the People, punctuates the skyline, adding a touch of historical significance to the modern cityscape. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and architecture, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of the old and the new in Beijing.
